select cs_order$suffix$.* from cs_order$suffix$
$join$
left join cs_member cs_member$CsMember.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_pay_member=cs_member$CsMember.suffix$.csm_id
left join cs_member cs_member$CsMember.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsMember.on$=cs_member$CsMember.suffix$.csm_id
left join cs_user_type cs_user_type$CsUserType.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_fee_type=cs_user_type$CsUserType.suffix$.csut_id
left join cs_user_type cs_user_type$CsUserType.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsUserType.on$=cs_user_type$CsUserType.suffix$.csut_id
left join cs_area cs_area$CsArea.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_area=cs_area$CsArea.suffix$.csa_id
left join cs_area cs_area$CsArea.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsArea.on$=cs_area$CsArea.suffix$.csa_id
left join cs_outlets cs_outlets$CsOutlets.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_outlets=cs_outlets$CsOutlets.suffix$.cso_id
left join cs_outlets cs_outlets$CsOutlets.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsOutlets.on$=cs_outlets$CsOutlets.suffix$.cso_id
left join cs_car_model cs_car_model$CsCarModel.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_model=cs_car_model$CsCarModel.suffix$.cscm_id
left join cs_car_model cs_car_model$CsCarModel.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsCarModel.on$=cs_car_model$CsCarModel.suffix$.cscm_id
left join cs_car cs_car$CsCar.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_car=cs_car$CsCar.suffix$.csc_id
left join cs_car cs_car$CsCar.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsCar.on$=cs_car$CsCar.suffix$.csc_id
left join cs_provid cs_provid$CsProvid.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_provid=cs_provid$CsProvid.suffix$.csp_id
left join cs_provid cs_provid$CsProvid.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsProvid.on$=cs_provid$CsProvid.suffix$.csp_id
left join cs_credit_card cs_credit_card$CsCreditCard.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_credit_card=cs_credit_card$CsCreditCard.suffix$.cscc_id
left join cs_credit_card cs_credit_card$CsCreditCard.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsCreditCard.on$=cs_credit_card$CsCreditCard.suffix$.cscc_id
left join cs_credit_bill cs_credit_bill$CsCreditBill.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_credit_bill=cs_credit_bill$CsCreditBill.suffix$.cscb_id
left join cs_credit_bill cs_credit_bill$CsCreditBill.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsCreditBill.on$=cs_credit_bill$CsCreditBill.suffix$.cscb_id
left join cs_product cs_product$CsProduct.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.cso_insure_type=cs_product$CsProduct.suffix$.csp_id
left join cs_product cs_product$CsProduct.suffix$ on cs_order$suffix$.$CsProduct.on$=cs_product$CsProduct.suffix$.csp_id
where 1=1 and cs_order$suffix$.cso_status!=-1
$definex$
order by $desc$ desc
order by $asc$ asc
order by cso_id desc
limit #limit#
limit 255
